poem:
Title: In Fierce Grace - A Widow's Tale

Backdrop - death's cruel pantomime,
where heroes break asunder.
Yet in her tempest, she stands, sublime,
through gory deafening thunder.
Strength clad in crimson lipstick, sugar spun,
Yulia, grand theatre's queen.
Not waiting in the wings, the setting sun,
Cast in shattered-silk screen,
Calls world-wearied leaders to wake,
In her fierce, defiant scene.
